page.title: 08FARM MACHINERY
page.content: {The combine harvester.} This gets it's name because it combines the actions of reaping and threshing.It cuts the crop,then separates it from the straw and chaff. {The tractor. The main function of the tractor is to pull the plough which breaks up the soil so seeds can be sown-but it can also pull a wide range of other attachments. {The digger. The main use of the digger is to pull up dead trees and to dig trenches for burying waste materials. {The fork lift machine. This is used to lift the platforms that have the bags of fertiliser on them.The fork lift machine is most important as without fertilisers,the crops wouldn't grow.
